name: My Dear Farm
summary:
Decorating with vegetables had never been as fun! Grow your crops with love and enjoy this sim farming-adventure! Set out into this horticultural adventure being your best farmer self. Change your appearance, hairstyle, and even your pet to your liking!

Grow your crops to grow your business! Once you're done harvesting the products of your hard labor, go into the marketplace to sell your wares and build your farming empire! Collect and decorate! My Dear Farm is filled to the brim with interesting furniture and decoration sets to unlock so your farm can look as stylish as you want it to be!
